entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
